Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Networking.Server.ServerSocket

Class MainServerTCP

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Networking.Server.Server
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Networking.Server.ServerSocket.MainServerTCP
All Implemented Interfaces:
ObserverMessageToServer<MessageToServer>
public class MainServerTCP extends Server implements ObserverMessageToServer<MessageToServer>
This class is the TCP main server. It extends Server and implements ObserverMessageToServer<MessageToServer>. It receives MessageToServer from MessageToServerDispatcher concerning game handling (e.g. create new game, register to game...) and heart beat message.

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(Socket senderSocket, MessageToServer message)
      This method is used by MessageToServerDispatcher to notify TCP server that a new message has arrived and hence has to be opened. Thread executing this method will wait until Socket from which it's receiving messages is put inside connected clients hashmap.
      Specified by:
      update in interface ObserverMessageToServer<MessageToServer>
      Parameters:
      senderSocket - Socket from which message has arrived
      message - MessageToServer arrived

    • accept

      This method tells caller that message can be accepted by the object
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      message - MessageToServer that could be accepted
      Returns:
      true if and only if message can be accepted

    • registerSocket

      public void registerSocket(Socket socket, MessageToServerDispatcher messageToServerDispatcher)
      This method is called by TCPConnectionAcceptor to notify that a client has only connected but has sent nothing
      Parameters:
      socket - Socket is the client's socket

    • runHeartBeatTesterForClient

      protected void runHeartBeatTesterForClient()
      This method is used to check heart beat timing of connected clients. If client do not send heart beat message for more than Settings.MAX_DELTA_TIME_BETWEEN_HEARTBEATS it deletes it from lastHeartBeatOfClients hashmap, it sets it to inactive using MainController.setPlayerInactive(String). It doesn't remove it from connectedClients hashmap because client can reconnect, and thus it is necessary to keep its private token.
      Specified by:
      runHeartBeatTesterForClient in class Server

    • resetServer

      public void resetServer()
      This method is used to reset main TCP server and main controller.
      Specified by:
      resetServer in class Server

    • killClientHandlers

      public void killClientHandlers()
      This method is used to interrupt clients' handler and message dispatcher thread It removes them as observers from MessageToServerDispatcher.
      Specified by:
      killClientHandlers in class Server
